data.name: Occulto Demo
data.detailed_description:
Occulto is a point and click artistic adventure game set in a fantasy world.

It is being developed by two fans of the genre. This is our very first game and we want to create an artistic adventure game, with challenging riddles, hand drawn scenes, animations and original soundtracks.

The whole game is under development, and its release will be approximately on the end of 2022 or the first months of 2023. Please be patient, this is a truly indie game! :)

You will guide Eliot, a young mage apprentice, through riddles, mysteries, traps and help him find his Magister, who mysteriously disappeared.
An evil presence is looking for a powerful book which is under the custody of the Magister.

data.short_description: Occulto is a indie point and click artistic adventure game set in a fantasy world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ or newer
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Dual Core (SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ or newer
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual Core (SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated video graphics card with 2GB of memory
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated video graphics card with 2GB of memory
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
